text:
Juri, good job out there.
It was a pretty good match.

Yeah, we almost had it,
but... it was close.

Well, after such a battle, you seem to have
already caught your breath and look fine.

Hey hey, don't say such pathetic things.
I think you could do it if you tried.

Oh, I've got an idea! How about joining everyone's
training sessions starting tomorrow?
Let's build up our stamina together.
I'll try to join in whenever I have free time.
